version_description:
- Added an option to mix TaoMix 2 with other music apps. (See the app's settings)
- Added a slider to control the master volume of TaoMix 2. (See the app's settings)
- Added Sebastien's mum to the credits. :)
- Fixed a bug causing a conflict with

- Added a slider to control the master volume of TaoMix 2. (See the app's settings)
- Added Sebastien's mum to the credits. :)

• 输入名称重新命名音景
• 用户界面改善
• Bug修复

感谢您宝贵的反馈意见。
如有任何问题、意见或建议，请联系我们，发送邮件至：

• 中文翻译
• 输入名称重新命名音景
• 用户界面改善
• Bug修复

感谢您宝贵的反馈意见。
如有任何问题、意见或建议，请联系我们，发送邮件至：
support@inookta.com

- We fixed a crash occurring when too many sounds were added.
- We fixed an issue preventing some users to download the sound packs.
- We fixed a crash that could occur when removing a sound from a soundscape, on iOS 8.
- Minor UI improvements.

- We fixed a crash occurring when too many sounds were added.
- We fixed an issue preventing some users to download the sound packs.
- We fixed a crash that could occur when removing a sound from a soundscape, on iOS 8.
- Minor UI improvements.

- 此应用已被翻译成德语、意大利语、日语、韩语和西班牙语
- We fixed an issue that could cause the app to drain the battery too fast.
- We fixed an issue in which the app could continue to play noise at a low volume when paused.
- We updated the source code to Swift 3.

- UI improvements
- Localization improvements
- Bug fixes

Hello! This new version fixes some bugs and includes some optimisations.

Keep writing at support-taomix@mwmapps.com, your feedback are everything to us! And if you like TaoMix, make sure to rate it on the store :)

- Fixed a bug that could prevent users from importing audio files from GarageBand.
- A few other minor bugs have been fixed.
